text.name: Regret
text.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Vibration] Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional [Vibration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]

text.name: Regret
text.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Vibration] Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional [Vibration] Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]
If target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon [VibrationExplosion],
Deal Wrath Damage by (6 + 2x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised

text.name: Regret
text.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 2 random removable negative effects applied to self
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +3 [Vibration] Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional [Vibration] Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]
If target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon [VibrationExplosion],
Deal Wrath Damage by (12 + 3x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised.

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]

passiveList.name: Bound Wrath
passiveList.desc:
This unit's leftmost skill on the Dashboard loses 1 Base Power and gains 2 Coin Power
At the start of the turn, if at 4- Speed, gain 1 [HitResultUp]

text.name: Regret
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has a negative status effect, Atk Weight +1
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion].
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by [VibrationExplosion] increases by 30% of [Vibration] on target.
Reduce [Vibration] Count by 1
[EndSkill] Gain 3 [Binding] and 1 [HitResultUp] next turn.

text.name: Regret
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has a negative status effect, Atk Weight +1
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by [VibrationExplosion] increases by 40% of [Vibration] on target.
If target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon [VibrationExplosion],
Deal Wrath Damage by (6 + 2x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised
Reduce [Vibration] Count by 1
[EndSkill] Gain 3 [Binding] and 1 [HitResultUp] next turn.
